subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Darnell Stapleton, 25, who won a title with the 2008 Steelers, is the new coach of the New York Sharks of the Women’s Football Alliance.
snippet: Darnell Stapleton, 25, who won a title with the 2008 Steelers, is the new coach of the New York Sharks of the Women’s Football Alliance.
